subject: Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The team has begun the M.L.S. season 2-4 and appears set to miss the playoffs again. But because of stadium renovations, its home opener is not until May 10.
snippet: The team has begun the M.L.S. season 2-4 and appears set to miss the playoffs again. But because of stadium renovations, its home opener is not until May 10.
